description.english: Arrive at the Raven's Road Camp.

description.english: Complete the "A Taste from Home" quest.

description.brazilian: Cumpra a missão "Plano de fuga".

displayName.italian: Mi è mancata la tua luce

description.english: Look from the telescope.
description.german: Sieh durch das Teleskop.
description.french: Regarder dans le télescope.
description.italian: Utilizza il cannocchiale.
description.spanish: Mirar a través del telescopio
description.japanese: 望遠鏡をのぞく。
description.brazilian: Olhe pelo telescópio.
description.latam: Mirar a través del telescopio.

description.english: Hold more than 500 Cribes.
description.german: Sammle mehr als 500 Cribes.
description.french: Avoir plus de 500 cribes.
description.italian: Ottieni più di 500 Cribe.
description.spanish: Cargar más de 500 Cribes.
description.japanese: クライブを501個以上所持する。
description.brazilian: Junte mais de 500 cribes.
description.latam: Cargar más de 500 Cribes.

description.english: Defeat 30 Plague Crawlers.
description.german: Besiege 30 Plagenschleicher.
description.french: Éliminer 30 Maraudeurs du Fléau.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 30 Pedinatori della Piaga.
description.spanish: Derrotar a 30 acechadores de la plaga
description.japanese: プラーグ・クロウラーを30体倒す。
description.brazilian: Acabe com 30 Rastejadores da Praga.
description.latam: Derrotar a 30 Acechadores de Plaga.

description.english: Obtain the Scout Medal.
description.german: Hol dir die Spähermedaille.

description.italian: Ottieni la medaglia del ricognitore.
description.spanish: Obtener la medalla de explorador
description.japanese: 偵察者のメダルを入手する。
description.brazilian: Consiga a Medalha de Explorador.
description.latam: Obtener la Medalla de Explorador.

displayName.japanese: 恐れを知らぬクーリン

description.english: Defeat Ryssar Odekt, The Urlag Bonebreaker.
description.german: Besiege Ryssar Odekt, den Knochenbrecher der Urlags.

description.schinese: 打败乌拉格人碎骨者雷萨尔·奥德克特
description.japanese: ウーラグのボーンブレイカー、リッサー・オデクトを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote Ryssar Odekt, o Quebra-Ossos Urlag.

description.english: Defeat Glekt Kahnem, The Urlag Scout Leader.

description.spanish: Derrotar a Glekt Kahnem, el líder Urlag de los exploradores
description.schinese: 打败乌拉格人哨兵首领格莱克特·卡奈姆
description.russian: Одолейте Глекта Канема, командира урлагских разведчиков.
description.japanese: ウーラグの偵察者リーダー、グレクト・カーネムを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote Glekt Kahnem, o Líder Urlag de Exploradores.

displayName.japanese: ギリギリのタイミング

description.english: Defeat Ankar, The Urlag Frost Warlord.

description.brazilian: Entregue o diário do Darian para a Riiam.

description.english: Cook all 11 edible ingredients combination results.
description.german: Koche alle 11 essbaren Zutatenkombinationen.
description.french: Cuisiner les 11 combinaisons d'ingrédients comestibles.
description.italian: Prepara tutte le 11 possibili combinazioni di ingredienti commestibili.
description.spanish: Cocinar las 11 combinaciones de ingredientes comestibles

description.english: Finish the game.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab.
description.french: Finir le jeu.
description.italian: Termina il gioco.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo.
description.latam: Terminar el Juego.

description.english: Finish the game saving your progress maximum 5 times in total.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab, nachdem du deinen Fortschritt höchstens 5 Mal gespeichert hast.
description.french: Finir le jeu en sauvegardant votre progression 5 fois ou moins.
description.italian: Termina il gioco salvando i tuoi progressi al massimo 5 volte in totale.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego guardando el progreso un total de 5 veces como máximo
description.schinese: 通关游戏，并且保存次数最多5次
description.russian: Пройдите игру, сохранившись максимум пять раз.
description.japanese: 進行状況セーブ回数合計5回以下でゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo salvando o seu progresso no máximo 5 vezes.
description.latam: Terminar el juego salvando tu progreso como máximo 5 veces en total.

description.english: Defeat one Urlag Boss without being damaged.
description.german: Besiege einen Boss der Urlags, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.french: Vaincre un boss urlag sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss Urlag senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Derrotar a un jefe Urlag sin sufrir daño
description.schinese: 打败一个乌拉格人首领，并且不受伤害
description.russian: Одолейте одного урлагского босса, не получив урона.
description.japanese: ウーラグのボスを1体、ダメージを受けずに倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefe dos urlags sem sofrer dano.
description.latam: Derrotar a un Jefe Urlag sin recibir daño.

description.english: Collect the 15 Relics in the game.
description.german: Sammle die 15 Relikte im Spiel.
description.french: Collecter les 15 reliques en jeu
description.italian: Recupera i 15 cimeli nel gioco.
description.spanish: Conseguir las 15 reliquias del juego
description.schinese: 收集游戏中的15个古代遗物
description.japanese: ゲームで15種類の記念品を集める。
description.brazilian: Junte as 15 Relíquias do jogo.
description.latam: Conseguir las 15 Reliquias en el juego.

description.english: Finish the game in under 3 hours.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in weniger als 3 Stunden ab.
description.french: Finir le jeu en moins de 3 heures.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in meno di 3 ore.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego en menos de 3 horas

description.japanese: ゲームを3時間以内にクリアする。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em menos de 3 horas.
description.latam: Terminar el juego en menos de 3 horas.
